text: Jean-François Richet (born 1966), is a French screenwriter, director, and producer. He grew up in Meaux, a suburb east of Paris. ==Selected filmography== * Inner City (1995) – named at the César Awards 1996 in the Best Debut category. * Ma 6-T va crack-er (1997) – a film which caricatures gang warfare. * Assault on Precinct 13 (2005), a loose remake of John Carpenter's 1976 film of the same name * Mesrine (2008) * One Wild Moment (2015) * Blood Father (2016) * The Emperor of Paris (2018) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Writers from Paris Category:French film directors Category:French film producers Category:French male screenwriters Category:French screenwriters Category:Best Director César Award winners Category:1966 births
title: Jean-François Richet
